org.mini2Dx.tiled.tileset

Class TilesetSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.tiled.tileset.TilesetSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImageTilesetSource, TsxTilesetSource

    public abstract class TilesetSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Base class for tileset sources

      • contains

        public boolean contains(int tileId,
                        int firstGid,
                        int lastGid)
        Returns true if a tileset contains the tile with the given id
        Parameters:
        tileId - The tile id to search for
        firstGid - The first gid of the tileset
        lastGid - The last gid of the tileset
        Returns:
        False if the tileset does not contain the tile
